TopicTitle: Looking for a useful reason for surface tests.

Articles.Content:
In light of the Recent SLS Booster tests, Omar Biyrouti on Facebook was recreating it, and i had a thought. I want a mod to make the surface tests actually useful. 

As in " Perform stress test on mk1 capsule" and the reward would increase the crash tolerance from 6.0m/s to 7.0m/s. Or 

"Run test on fully loaded solid fuel booster while on the surface." and the reward would reduce the chance of breakage. 

i feel this would give us a reason to actually test objects on the ground before launching.

i am looking for a modder willing to take up the challenge. i would do this, but i have no modding experience.

Thanks y'all.
I would love this. Intersellar had an upgradable parts system, but its such a buggy mod, and it doesnt affect the stock parts
